suggest.dompdf/dompdf: To use PDF functionality, please install the library dompdf/dompdf.
suggest.amasty/module-magento-custom-form-graphq: Install amasty/module-magento-custom-form-graphql module to activate Graphql and Custom Forms integration.
suggest.amasty/module-custom-form-to-builder: Install Amasty_CustomFormToBuilder module to activate the integration with Custom Reports Builder extension and create valuable reports about your Custom Forms.
